service.title: YAML Media Type
service.documentation: This document registers the application/yaml media type and the +yaml structured syntax suffix with IANA. Both identify document components that are serialized according to the YAML specification.

media-type.documentation: YAML is a data serialization format that is capable of conveying one or multiple documents in a single presentation stream (e.g., a file or a network resource). The media type for YAML is application/yaml
